verses.verse: The fool <S%H5036><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "There is no God. <S%H430><s%>" They are corrupt. <S%H7843><s%> They have done abominable <S%H8581><s%> works. <S%H5949><s%> There is none who does <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> looked down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> if there <S%H3426><s%> were any who understood, <S%H7919><s%> who sought <S%H1875><s%> after God. <S%H430><s%>
They have all gone aside. <S%H5493><s%> They have together <S%H3162><s%> become corrupt. <S%H444><s%> There is none who does <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> no, <S%H259><s%> not one.

Have all the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> no knowledge, <S%H3045><s%> who eat up <S%H398><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> as they eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and don't <S%H7121><s%> call on Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>
There they were in great <S%H6343><s%> fear, <S%H6342><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> is in the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
You frustrate <S%H954><s%> the plan <S%H6098><s%> of the poor, <S%H6041><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is his refuge. <S%H4268><s%>

Oh that <S%H5414><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> would come out of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> restores <S%H3068><s%> the fortunes <S%H7622><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
